item.title: 【HD Live Performances】WEB-RiP - Juliette Armanet - Imagine [Paris 2024 Olympics Opening Ceremony 26 July 2024] 4K HLG DD5.1 HEVC [azamusic]
item.description:
I've had a few requests to upload this so as with my previous post, I've merged Channel 9 Australia's broadcast DTV DD5.1 audio into it this 4K video to get the best possible audio.

Please note this is using HLG BT.2020 10bit colour scheme!
